backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor for the chat backend, defining types and state for messages, chatrooms, user profiles, reactions, and active users, with functions for access control, CRUD operations on chatrooms/messages, reactions, flagging, and blob storage integration.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting that MessageBubble.tsx was updated to replace always-visible action buttons with a context menu (right-click on desktop, long-press on mobile) containing Reply, React, and Share actions.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing short summaries of each frontend source file, serving as a reference index for the frontend codebase structure and component responsibilities.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML entry point for the React app with viewport meta tags, cache-busting headers, and a versioned script tag loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React application component that sets up TanStack Router with lobby, chatroom (with messageId search param), and admin routes, conditionally hiding the header and footer on admin and chatroom pages.
frontend/src/components/AvatarPickerDial: Dialog component for selecting or uploading a user avatar, supporting file upload, GIF search via Giphy (with debounced search and trending fallback), and avatar removal.
frontend/src/components/ChatArea.tsx: Main chat interface component that renders filtered messages, handles auto-scroll and deep-link scroll-to-target with highlight, manages reply context, and integrates the pinned video area and message input.
frontend/src/components/ChatroomCard.tsx: Renders a card for a chatroom with thumbnail previews for YouTube, Twitch, and Twitter media, displaying metadata like topic, category, viewer count, and last activity timestamp.
frontend/src/components/CreateChatroomDi: A dialog form for creating a new chatroom, supporting topic, description, category, and media attachment via file upload, video URL (YouTube/Twitch), or Twitter post with live preview.
frontend/src/components/ExternalLinkDisc: A confirmation modal that warns users they are leaving the app before navigating to an external URL, showing the target URL and Cancel/Continue buttons.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: A simple footer component displaying a copyright notice and a link to caffeine.ai with a heart icon.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: The app header with the Chattr logo, an inline editable username field with alphanumeric validation, an avatar picker, and a back button when inside a chatroom.
frontend/src/components/LoginPrompt.tsx: A no-op placeholder component that renders nothing, explicitly documenting that authentication is not used in this app.
frontend/src/components/MessageBubble.ts: Renders an individual chat message bubble with support for reactions, pinning, replies, URL link detection, embedded YouTube/Twitch/Twitter media, GIF display, voice message playback, and a context menu for moderation actions.
frontend/src/components/MessageInput.tsx: A chat message input component supporting text messages, image uploads, GIF search via Giphy, voice recording, and automatic detection of YouTube/Twitch/Twitter URLs in typed text.
frontend/src/components/PinnedVideo.tsx: Renders a pinned YouTube or Twitch video embed within a chatroom, with an unpin button that calls the useUnpinVideo mutation.
frontend/src/components/VoiceMessagePlay: Audio player component for voice messages that displays a waveform visualization, play/pause controls, a seek slider, and pauses other playing audio instances.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) using React Query, and invalidates all dependent queries whenever the actor instance changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: Generic hook that debounces a value by a configurable delay, returning the latest stable value after the delay has elapsed.
frontend/src/hooks/useForceFreshChatroom: Hook that purges stale or empty cached chatroom data and forces a fresh refetch of the chatrooms list once the actor becomes ready, exposing a recovery-in-progress flag.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context (login, logout, identity state) via a React context provider and hook, backed by the DFINITY AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Central collection of React Query hooks and mutations for chatrooms, messages, reactions, image uploads, and user identity (username/avatar), all wired to the ICP backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that sets up Tailwind directives, defines light/dark theme CSS custom properties (OKLCH color tokens), and includes mobile-specific input styles and custom voice message range input styling.
frontend/src/lib/config.ts: Exports frontend configuration constants including the Giphy API key and result limit.
frontend/src/lib/formatters.ts: Exports a single utility function `formatCompactNumber` that formats numbers into compact notation (k, M, B suffixes).
frontend/src/lib/giphy.ts: Provides functions to search Giphy by term and fetch trending GIFs, returning normalized GIF objects with preview and original URLs.
frontend/src/lib/html2canvasLoader.ts: Empty file, likely a placeholder for a lazy-loader for the html2canvas library.
frontend/src/lib/imageCompression.ts: Client-side image compression utility that resizes and recompresses image files using a canvas, skipping GIFs/SVGs and falling back to the original if compression increases file size.
frontend/src/lib/twitterEmbedRenderer.ts: Empty file, likely a placeholder for a Twitter embed rendering utility.
frontend/src/lib/twitterOEmbedPreview.ts: Fetches Twitter oEmbed JSON to extract safe preview fields (author, text, image) with in-flight deduplication and localStorage caching.
frontend/src/lib/twitterOEmbedPreviewCac: localStorage cache layer for Twitter oEmbed preview data, supporting versioned entries with a 7-day expiration and cache-key derivation from tweet IDs.
frontend/src/lib/twitterThumbnail.ts: Empty file, likely a placeholder for a Twitter thumbnail fetching utility.
frontend/src/lib/twitterThumbnailCache.t: Empty file, likely a placeholder for a Twitter thumbnail caching utility.
frontend/src/lib/videoUtils.ts: Utility functions for extracting video/post IDs and generating thumbnail/embed URLs for YouTube, Twitch (clips, VODs, live), and Twitter/X.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React application entry point that mounts the app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDeleteChatroomsP: Password-protected admin moderation page that lists chatrooms with flagged message counts, supports filtering/searching, and allows admins to delete chatrooms via a confirmation dialog.
frontend/src/pages/ChatroomPage.tsx: Page component that loads a specific chatroom by ID, increments its view count on load, and renders the ChatArea component; handles loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/LobbyPage.tsx: Main lobby page displaying a searchable, filterable, algorithmically sorted list of chatrooms with options to create a new chatroom and navigate into existing ones.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom OKLCH-based color tokens, border radii, animations, and plugins (typography, container-queries, animate) for the frontend design system.
project_state.json: Project state metadata for the Chattr app, tracking existing features, a pending feature request to replace message action buttons with a context menu, and architectural notes.
